basics.name: Ning Liu
basics.label: Principal Machine Learning Scientist
basics.summary: a Machine Learning Scientist with over six years of experience developing and applying novel neural architectures and graph-based models to accelerate numerical simulation and discover next-generation design

work.name: Global Engineering & Materials, Inc.
work.summary: Lead the development and deployment of novel machine learning models to accelerate the prediction of multi-physics simulations, such as using neural operators and variational autoencoders to learn aircraft aerodynamics, process modeling of composite curing, and applying large language models (LLM) to discover optimal polymer/composite structures for defense applications. Another line of work is on building digital twins for additive manufacturing.
highlights: Write small-business research proposals (e.g., SBIR/STTR) and develop teaming strategies with academic collaborators; develop and implement novel numerical methods for computational mechanics modeling; supervise team members and lead quarterly reviews with technical team and sponsors; publish high-quality papers on top-tier journals/conferences.
